extendedIngredients.name: smoked sausage
extendedIngredients.original: 3 packages fully cooked smoked sausage, sliced slightly on the diagonal

extendedIngredients.name: vegetable oil
extendedIngredients.original: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil (or just enough to coat bottom of skillet)

title: Crock-Pot BBQ Cocktail Sausage
instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Saute sausage in batches for just a minute or two until browned. Transfer browned sausage to a double layer of paper towels and blot away excess grease and then transfer to your slow cooker.Whisk together the sauce ingredients and pour them over the sausage. Stir to combine. Cover and set slow cooker to LOW and cook for 3 to 4 hours or HIGH for 2 to 3 hours.Keep the sausages in your slow cooker for the duration of your party to keep them warm. Serve with toothpicks.

steps.step: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat.
Saute sausage in batches for just a minute or two until browned.
Transfer browned sausage to a double layer of paper towels and blot away excess grease and then transfer to your slow cooker.

Whisk together the sauce ingredients and pour them over the sausage. Stir to combine. Cover and set slow cooker to LOW and cook for 3 to 4 hours or HIGH for 2 to 3 hours.Keep the sausages in your slow cooker for the duration of your party to keep them warm.
